channel.title: Something cool I just found out about
channel.description:
Alright, with internet explorer, go to a website that has lots of images.
Put this code into your address bar:
javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24;x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300;y5=200; DI=document.images; DIL=DI.length;function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math.sin(R*x1+i*x2+x3)*x4+x5;DIS.top=Math.cos(R*y1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval('A()',5); void(0);
And then press enter and watch the cool effects. I didn't make this, just found it somewhere.

item.title: Something cool I just found out about
item.dc:creator: @Vahuka Vahuka
item.description:
@Vahuka wrote:

in firefox it just screws with the stars but in ie…woah…
EDIT: in firefox it works on any other page 'cept mopar, wonder why?

Read full topic

item.title: Something cool I just found out about
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:16, topic:43692”][quote author=wonderguy6 link=topic=60730.msg732986#msg732986 date=1167911345]
lol so can we use javascripts on webbrowsers? kewl!
[/quote]

Yeah as far as I know it’s called javascript injection. You can use it to steal passwords sometimes, to make it send recovery emails to your email and stuff. Only learned that from hackthissite though, lol.[/quote]

thats awesome, know anymore javascripts?

Read full topic

item.title: Something cool I just found out about
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Alright, with internet explorer, go to a website that has lots of images.

Put this code into your address bar:

javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24;x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300;y5=200; DI=document.images; DIL=DI.length;function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position=‘absolute’; DIS.left=Math.sin(Rx1+ix2+x3)x4+x5;DIS.top=Math.cos(Ry1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval(‘A()’,5); void(0);

And then press enter and watch the cool effects. I didn’t make this, just found it somewhere.
